snippet.title: Worms Revolution - Trailer
snippet.description:
✅ Link to the game 👉  https://bit.ly/3vXTgJp

Worms™ Revolution is another entry in the classic turn-based strategy series to come to the PC,  featuring exciting new features and beautiful 3D graphics whilst retaining the classic 2D gameplay that fans love. Choose to play the extensive single-player mode which features both campaign and puzzle missions or dive straight into multiplayer warfare via local play. For the first time ever see the inclusion of dynamic water, physics objects, and worm classes! Customize your experience by choosing what classes you play with, what they look like, and even how they speak!

Follow us on:
Web: 👉  https://bit.ly/3rpVmMh
Twitch: 👉  https://bit.ly/3vVI6CJ
Twitter: 👉  https://bit.ly/3fdOUFK
Facebook: 👉  https://bit.ly/2NWKVCw
